0.question: Ted and Kristen drove from Westport to Grayson's Park. They drove 179 miles and then stopped for lunch. They drove 142 miles and stopped for gas. They had 59 more miles to go. What is the distance from Westport to Grayson's Park?

1.question: Teri and Anna are building a giant tower. Teri used 237 building pieces. Anna used 325 building pieces. How many more pieces did Anna use?

2.question: 862 peple ran in the marathon this year. 591 people crossed the finish line. How many people did not finish the marathon?

3.question: Ernie and Bert together have 200 stickers.  They want to have the same number of stickers. To do that, Ernie has to give Bert 42 stickers. How many stickers did Bert have at first? Hint: How many stickers would Ernie and Bert have if they had the same amount?

4.question: Jason has 375 baseball cards. Kyle has 148 fewer cards than Jason. How many cards do they have together?
